name: Square vs Rectangle
description:
You are a square who have to destroy rectangles because they will try catch you.

To destroy them you must go over the rectangles and at high velocity.

The movement's square is:

  1. start slow(in this moment if the Rectangle touch you the game is finished).
  2. get fast velocity(you can destroy the Rectangles if you go over them)
  3. end slow(in this moment if the Rectangle touch you the game is finished).

Controllers:

Move the mouse where you want to move the square and press left button.
